blog.description: Icon: Mary Sage by @halleluland. [Icon id: a portrait from the chest up of a light-complexioned woman with curly orange hair, grinning with one hand behind her head. She's wearing a blue hoodie.] Elizabeth, aka Birdie. 23. White. She/her. Linguistics grad student. Accessible content. Read my about for more info!

summary: how about molly and caduceus for the character ask?
question: how about molly and caduceus for the character ask?
answer:
Fuck yeah, friend, fuck yes

Molly

  • First impression

I wasn’t particularly intrigued? Not turned off, just bored. I didn’t get for quite a while why everyone liked him so much.

  • Impression now

:( :( :( A very interesting character who I wish we’d seen more of - and someone who was going to be dragged, kicking and screaming, into his own story, if he’d survived. 

  • Favorite moment

I think… mmm. There are a lot of good ones, but I think my favorite is when he’s high on skein with Beau and says “I didn’t have a childhood” and just sort of… laughs hysterically.

  • Idea for a story

Well, he’s going to be a VERY big part of my Widofjord fic. Ironically, he’s sort of going to be the center of it, even though it starts after he’s dead, technically speaking. So look forward to that.

  • Unpopular opinion

Two things: Molly’s sexuality (as it was acted upon, I mean) and sexcapades were less about sex itself and more about feeling alive and making connections with other people, if that makes sense; and Molly wasn’t as… healthy, or nice, as he’s portrayed a lot of the time? Not a bad thing, though, it makes his character more complex.

  • Favorite relationship

MOLLY AND BEAU. Full stop. (Platonically, obvs.)

  • Favorite headcanon

This is pretty based in canon, but Molly’s a terrible performer. He’s picked some stuff up in the circus, and he can busk fine, but anything above like baseline he’s just bad at. He was the carnival barker, not a performer!

Caduceus

  • First impression

Oddly, about the same as Molly’s - I guess it takes me a while to really love Taliesin’s characters. It took me a month or two to really get into him.

  • Impression now

My son. My favorite queer homeschooled child. He just wears all his emotions on his sleeve and is a caretaker and god I love him so much I LOVE HIM SO MUCH

  • Favorite moment

I did adore his intro moment. I think my other favorite moment, though, was his breakdown after they stole the ship. (See below!)

  • Idea for a story

Honestly, so many, but nothing in stone yet. I love doing character studies of Taliesin’s characters, apparently.

  • Unpopular opinion

So… I don’t actually think Caduceus is the moral center of the M9? I’m convinced, irrevocably, that that honor belongs to Beau. Caduceus is true neutral, yo.

  • Favorite relationship

I LOVE Caduceus and Jester’s friendship. Give me more of that, please. Their moment of Caduceus’s breakdown was lovely and sweet and so good.

  • Favorite headcanon

Ace Caduceus. Gay Caduceus. ACE GAY CADUCEUS. Basically, queer Caduceus (although Tal’s pretty much confirmed he’s queer anyways). Other than that, I really like the idea of Caduceus as meticulous about his personal hygiene and care for some reason? Like, he always keeps his hair detangled and keeps his fur clean and stuff (and on that note, I’m definitely in the “firbolgs are furry” camp).

send me a character!

blog.name: shelbyroundthemountain
blog.title: Pod save my soul
blog.description: Shelby, She/Her, Libra, INFP. I enjoy podcasts and petting my cat Clifford. I post a lot of meta about Critical Role and other podcasts. I also have been trying to blog more about my personal experience and mental health, but I understand that's not what everyone wants on their dash so anything too serious will be tagged BUMMER ZONE. I also try my best to tag triggers but I can't make any promises.I encourage you to message to talk about ANYTHING you see here. I don't have nearly enough people to chat with.

title: Incorrect Role
body:
Nott: Are you alright? You didn’t sleep at all last night.
Caleb: I got a solid eight minutes. Not consecutively, but still. It’s fine. You’re not even that blurry.

blog.name: keplercryptids
blog.title: count the shells
blog.description: JD. they/them, 28, white. accessible blog, mostly TAZ and CR. faqs | ao3 | ko-fi | join our discord if you want help with descriptions! | avatar credit: cat-blouse. desc: a circular logo in the bi pride colors that says IPRE in the center, with colorful circles around the edge.

question: Nott for the ask meme?
answer:
oh, nott!! my daughter.

First impression: my first-first impression was probably something like…. “oh, that’s my goblin daughter”?? i don’t actually remember lol. I do remember that an early impression i got was that she wasn’t actually a goblin? it was a conspiracy theory that rattled around in my head for a few episodes but i don’t think that way now haha.

Impression now: she’s one of the more emotionally in-tune characters, which is surprising since she started out solely loyal to Caleb (though it makes sense how she became that way, since she’s very empathetic). 

Favorite moment: when she said “case closed” after finding jester omfggg

Idea for a story: i’ve been wanting to write a fic for awhile now about whoever she’s sent packages too, as well as the sentimental meaning behind a lot of her trinkets.

Unpopular opinion: I don’t know that i have one??

Favorite relationship: Nott and Jester’s friendship sustains me.

Favorite headcanon: i think she does (or tries to do, anyway) Caleb’s hair all the time.

Mostly Void, Partly Stars
💙🌙💙
blog.description:
